document.docAuthor: Alipanah, Helen, Yakovlev, Roman, Falsafi, Hossein, Witt, Thomas & Saldaitis, Aidas

subSubSection.paragraph:
Phalaena pyrina Linnaeus, 1761
, Fauna Svecica: 306.

LT: Sweden . Type material ( syntypes ) in LSL
.
Synonymy:

=
Noctua hypocasstani Poda, 1761
, Ins. Mus . Graecensis.: 88.
LT: Graecia. Type material is lost.

= P [ halaena ]
Noctua aesculi Linnaeus, 1767
, Syst. Nat. 1 (2): 833.

LT: Europe. Type material ( syntypes ) in LSL
.

=
Phalaena hilaris Geoffroy
in Fourcroy, 1785, Ent. Paris 2: 88

LT: France . Type material is lost
.

=
Zeuzera octopunctata Boisduval, [1841]
1834, Icones Hist. Lépid. Nouv. ou peu connus 2: 181.
LT: aux environs de Palerme [ Sicile ]. Type material is probably lost.

=
Zeuzera pyrina
ab. conflua Schultz, 1905 , Nyt. Mag. Naturvid. 43: 121.

LT:? Germany . Type material is probably lost
.

=
Zeuzera yprina
(sic!) f. paulomaculata Stichel, 1918 , Zeitschr. Wiss. Ins.-Biol. 14: 200.

LT: Germany . Type material ( holotype ) in MHUB
.

=
Zeuzera pyrina
ab. confluens Cockayne, 1955 , Entomol. Gaz. 6 (1): 6.

LT: London [ England ]. Type material ( holotype ) in BMNH
.

=
Zeuzera pyrina
f. marginestriata Lempke, 1961 , Tijdschr. Entomol. 104: 178.

paragraph.materialsCitation: LT: Halfweg [ The Netherlands ]. Type material ( holotype ) in coll. van Aartsen.

Distribution in Iran .
N, SW, E, and Central Iran ( Fig. 35D ).
